name: 林信標
objective:
1.無線通訊系統簡介
2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹
3.無線電通訊的傳播原理
4.行動通訊之調變技術
5.行動通訊之多工技術
6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析
7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼
8.無線網路系統
9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
schedule:
1 week　　Fundamentals of Wireless Communications
1 week　　Mobile Radio Propagation and Multipath Fading
1 week　　GSM and GPRS
2 weeks　　CDMA Technologies and Systems
2 weeks　　B3G Systems
2 weeks　　Handset Issues
2 weeks　　Wireless Access Networks
2 weeks　　MIMO OFDM Transmission
3 Weeks　　Final Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
Homework: 40% (2 times)

Final Project: 
1.　　Two pages’ report for your motivation, purpose, and your expectation on this project. 10%
2.　　Comments on two of your selected references (2 pages each) 20%
3.　　Final report and oral presentation of your work (must focus on your contributions) 30%
materials:
Reference books: 
1.　　T.S. Rappaport, “Wireless Communications”, 1996, Prentice Hall. 
2.　　S.R. Saunders, “Antennas and Propagation for Wireless Communication Systems”, 1999, John Willey & Sons, LTD.
3.　　Krzysztof Wesolowski, “Mobile Communication Systems”, 2002, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd. 
4.　　D.P. Agrawal, “Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems”, 2003, Thomson Learning, Inc.
